thread.title: H&M Q1 profit plunges: more price cuts ahead

title: H&M Q1 profit plunges: more price cuts ahead
text:
H&M Q1 profit plunges: more price cuts ahead 1:48pm BST - 00:43 
High inventories will carry price cuts into the second quarter, H&M warned on Tuesday, after the world's second largest clothing retailer reported a 61 percent plunge in first quarter profit hurt by price cutting. As Sonia Legg reports, the results sent shares down five per cent. ▲ Hide Transcript ▶ View Transcript 
High inventories will carry price cuts into the second quarter, H&M warned on Tuesday, after the world's second largest clothing retailer reported a 61 percent plunge in first quarter profit hurt by price cutting.
